question.title: (Java) Upgrading androidx.lifecycle:lifecycle-viewmodel
question.body:
When I try to upgrade androidx.lifecycle:lifecycle-viewmodel from 2.7.0 to 2.8.1 - error pops out:

Cannot resolve symbol 'AndroidViewModelFactory'

Question: Is there a way to get the same behaviour but without AndroidViewModelFactory?

The code snippet is:

public final class CameraXLivePreviewActivity extends AppCompatActivity {

    @Override
    protected void onCreate( final Bundle savedInstanceState ) {

        new ViewModelProvider(
                this,
                AndroidViewModelFactory.getInstance( getApplication() )
            )
            .get( CameraXViewModel.class )
            .getProcessCameraProvider()
            .observe(
                this,
                provider -> {
                    cameraProvider = provider;
                    bindAllCameraUseCases();
                } );

    }

}
